content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation, electrical_id 30404.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30404) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings: "out of fuel"; contains water (≈190.26 at 15°C) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system [164883] and providing steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; linked to fluid_system [164883].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 164883, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 164882, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 164895, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 164894, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 164890, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 164899, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 164898, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 164901, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 164902, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 164903, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid_System Identifier Mismatch:
   - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers (164219, 164303, 164385, 164469, 164551, 164635, 164717, 164801) failed to locate any candidates near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
   - Tip: Verify the active fluid_system identifiers from the current pipeline network—use identifiers present in the final entities (e.g., 164883) to ensure connection commands target the correct pipe group.

• Inadequate Search Radius Configuration:
   - Consistent absence of candidate pipe groups within a 15-tile radius indicates a misalignment between the expected and actual positions of the pipeline network.
   - Tip: Adjust the search radius and revalidate positional parameters to accurately reflect the spatial distribution of available pipe groups.
